snippet: The contralto Kathleen Ferrier, who died at 41, left a small but much-praised collection of recordings, now gathered in a three-disc set to honor the centennial of her birth.
abstract: Contralto Kathleen Ferrier, who died at 41, left a small but much-praised collection of recordings, now gathered in a three-disc set to honor the centennial of her birth.
lead_paragraph: The contralto Kathleen Ferrier, who died at 41, left a small but much-praised collection of recordings, now gathered in a three-disc set to honor the centennial of her birth.

headline.seo: Kathleen Ferrier and Her Centennial CD
headline.main: A Voice That Embraced a Nation
